comments.comments_text: Ilkay Gundogan (Manchester City) launches an inaccurate corner kick into the penalty area. The ball is out of play and the linesman points at the corner flag. Corner to Manchester City.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) launches an inaccurate corner kick into the penalty area. The ball is out of play and the linesman points at the corner flag. Corner to [TEAM].

comments.comments_text: David Silva (Manchester City) steps up to take the corner. He launches the ball into the penalty area, but it only finds the head of an opposing player who clears the danger.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) steps up to take the corner. He launches the ball into the penalty area, but it only finds the head of an opposing player who clears the danger.

comments.comments_text: Ilkay Gundogan (Manchester City) sends in the corner, but fails to find the head of any of his teammates, allowing the defence to clear. Manchester City have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

comments.comments_text: The corner from Bernardo Silva (Manchester City) is intercepted by the defence.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Great play by Ederson releases Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) in space on the edge of the box. He spots the keeper off his line and coolly puts the ball into the top right corner. 1:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! Great play by [PLAYER] releases [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) in space on the edge of the box. He spots the keeper off his line and coolly puts the ball into the top right corner. 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Alex Pritchard (Huddersfield) takes the corner which is cleared.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner which is cleared.

comments.comments_text: The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet of Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City) just outside the box. He doesn't think twice and fires a brilliant shot into the bottom left corner. His attempt was beyond the reach of Ben Hamer. 2:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet of [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) just outside the box. He doesn't think twice and fires a brilliant shot into the bottom left corner. His attempt was beyond the reach of [PLAYER]. 2:0.

comments.comments_text: The resulting corner, taken by Bernardo Silva (Manchester City), comes to nothing.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Ben Hamer makes a huge mistake and Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) has an easy task to put the ball into the back of the net. 3:0.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Steve Mounie gets to the ball and heads it over the defence to Jon Gorenc-Stankovic (Huddersfield), who meets it nicely and fires in into the back of the net. 3:1.

comments.comments_text: David Silva (Manchester City) struck with a perfectly taken free kick from the edge of the box. He curled the ball straight into the top right corner. There are not enough superlatives that can be used to describe that goal.
